meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express strong feelings of anger or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Oh, bedamned! I can't believe I forgot my keys again!
meanings.sent2: She slammed the door, muttering 'bedamned' under her breath.
meanings.sent3: After spilling his drink for the third time, he exclaimed 'bedamned' in annoyance.
meanings.sent4: The thunder rumbled loudly, making him shout 'bedamned' at the sky.
meanings.sent5: The screeching brakes of the car outside made him curse 'bedamned' in frustration.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express strong feelings of dismissal or disregard.
meanings.sent1: Well, bedamned! I don't care what they think about me.
meanings.sent2: With a wave of his hand, he said 'bedamned' to their opinions.
meanings.sent3: Ignoring the rude comment, she simply shrugged and muttered 'bedamned'.
meanings.sent4: The old man chuckled and said 'bedamned' to the rules of the game.
meanings.sent5: She confidently walked away, declaring 'bedamned' to anyone who doubted her abilities.
